config.hint: Comma-separated map from action ids to names. No spaces between entries.
config.name: Action IDs to Conversion Names (map)
config.default: 11036:Sign up - cloud,11037:Sign up - self-hosted free,11038:Sign up - self-hosted paid

config.hint: The PostHog instance URL from which you want to fetch events and persons data.
config.name: PostHog Instance URL

config.hint: A personal API key created from the 'My Account' menu.
config.name: PostHog API Access Key

config.hint: The project from which you want to fetch events and persons data. Can be found in Project Settings.
config.name: PostHog Project Token
